definition[0]: to give something to someone with your hand, especially because they have asked for it or should have it
example[0]: The soldiers were ordered to hand over their guns.
example[1]: He handed the phone over to me.
definition[1]: to give someone power or responsibility over something which you used to be in charge of
example[2]: On his retirement, he handed the business over to his son.
example[3]: Political control has been handed over to religious leaders.
example[4]: Now she feels the time has come to hand over to someone else.
definition[2]: to let someone else take charge of something which you were in charge of
